definitions.example: The children decided Grover was a cuddly monster.

definitions.definition: A cruel or antisocial person, especially a criminal.
definitions.example: Get away from those children, you meatheaded monster!

definitions.definition: A badly behaved child, a brat.

definitions.example: Have you seen those powerlifters on TV? They're monsters.

definitions.definition: A prodigy; someone very talented in a specific domain.
definitions.example: That dude playing guitar is a monster.

definitions.definition: A non-player character that player(s) fight against in role-playing games.
To make into a monster; to categorise as a monster; to demonise.
To behave as a monster to; to terrorise.
Very large; worthy of a monster.
